title: Fast, Flexible Solutions for Data Centers

title: Fast, Flexible Solutions for Data Centers
summary: Key Insights Data center operators are ready to invest in efficient, flexible, and low-cost energy sources that can mitigate stranded asset risks for utilities and keep ratepayer costs in check. Data centers use just 2% of global electricity today.
fullContent: Key Insights Data center operators are ready to invest in efficient, flexible, and low-cost energy sources that can mitigate stranded asset risks for utilities and keep ratepayer costs in check. Data centers use just 2% of global electricity today. Electricity demand growth from data centers is projected to be less than industrial operations, electric vehicles, household appliances, and space cooling over the next 5 years. Many utilities, specifically in the United States, have a track record of over-forecasting demand, spending billions of dollars building power plants for load that did not materialize. This risk is more salient today given the unpredictability of data center load growth. A range of energy solutions for data centers —  including energy efficiency, flexibility technologies, and fast, modular, and low-cost energy sources — can temper the risks of over-building and high ratepayer costs. These solutions are already the most attractive options for data center operators tod

title: Clearcutting Can Lead to Severe Floods, But It Doesn’t Have To
summary: It has long been understood that clearcutting forests leads to more runoff, worsening flooding. But a new study finds that logging can reshape watersheds in surprising ways, leading to dramatically more flooding in some forests, while having little effect on others.

title: Inside Acuity Knowledge Partners: CFA charterholders building the future of finance
summary: What happens when you bring CFA® charterholders into the heart of your organization? At @AcuityKnowledgePartners, it’s not just about credentials, it’s about real-world impact. In this episode of "How CFA Charterholders Are Transforming Top Firms," meet the finance professionals...
fullContent: What happens when you bring CFA® charterholders into the heart of your organization? At @AcuityKnowledgePartners, it’s not just about credentials, it’s about real-world impact. In this episode of "How CFA Charterholders Are Transforming Top Firms," meet the finance professionals driving strategy, innovation, and trust inside one of India’s leading investment companies. From investment leadership to human resources and sales strategy, discover how CFA charterholders and CFA Program candidates are shaping the future of finance, backed by rigorous training, ethical decision-making, and a commitment to excellence. You’ll hear from: - Prakash Sumani, CFA, Director, Training and Knowledge Management, Acuity Knowledge Partners - Vimal Singh, Director, Global Head of Recruitment, Acuity Knowledge Partners - Parvez Abbas, CFA, Assistant Director, Lending Services, Acuity Knowledge Partners - Kanishka Malhotra, Delivery Lead, Private Markets, Acuity Knowledge Partners (Passed the Level II CFA ex
